title: School Of Rock (DVD_Rip for iPod)
description:
School of Rock w/ Jack Black

Riped at 640 x (wide screen) w/ 700 bitrate. 

Will play perfect through your iPod and looks good at full screen on your computer or TV as well.

FYI, most people already know this, but you can buy cables that allow you to play your iPod through your TV, in fact I hardly ever watch my actual iPod screen. It&#039;s just too small. With that in mind, I try to Rip all my movies to either look great or at least decent on a TV screen so the quality is good. Usually I use a 1400 bit rate but it makes the files huge, so I went with half that on this one. Still looks better then most iPod DVD Rips.
